Package stickman.model

Interface Entity

  • public interface Entity

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  Entity.Layer
      The set of available layers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getHeight()
      Tells the view how tall to draw the given entity (can change over time)
      java.lang.String getImagePath()
      Tells the view the image path for the entity at the current moment in time (this means the image can change, enabling simple gif-like animation)
      Entity.Layer getLayer()
      Tells the view what Z-order to draw the entity on - to the back, or to the front.
      double getWidth()
      Tells the view how wide to draw the given entity (can change over time)
      double getXPos()
      Tells the view what the x position of the entity currently is.
      double getYPos()
      Tells the view what the y position of the entity currently is.

    • Method Detail

      • getImagePath

        java.lang.String getImagePath()
        Tells the view the image path for the entity at the current moment in time (this means the image can change, enabling simple gif-like animation)
        Returns:
        The path of the image where resources/ is the relative root (e.g. "example.png" will look for resources/example.png)

      • getXPos

        double getXPos()
        Tells the view what the x position of the entity currently is.
        Returns:
        The x position using the top left hand corner as 0,0 and increasing as the position moves right.

      • getYPos

        double getYPos()
        Tells the view what the y position of the entity currently is.
        Returns:
        The y position using the top left hand corner as 0,0 and increasing as the position moves DOWN (JavaFX does not use the standard mathematics axes with the origin in the bottom left)

      • getHeight

        double getHeight()
        Tells the view how tall to draw the given entity (can change over time)
        Returns:
        The height in co-ordinate space (effectively number of pixels)

      • getWidth

        double getWidth()
        Tells the view how wide to draw the given entity (can change over time)
        Returns:
        The width in co-ordinate space (effectively number of pixels)

      • getLayer

        Entity.Layer getLayer()
        Tells the view what Z-order to draw the entity on - to the back, or to the front. The order within each layer is undefined.
        Returns:
        The layer to draw the entity on.
